question: Your neighbours have recently written to you to complain about the noise from your house/ flat.Write a letter to your neighbours. In your letterexplain the reasons for the noiseapologisedescribe what action you will take
text: I was so disappointed and shocked after hearing that noise coming from my flat has been destroying your sleep. We had no idea that you were experiencing such noise due to ongoing renovation work in my flat. I hope you will accept my apology.

As you know, I am trying to renovate my kitchen and bedroom after my work. Unfortunately, someone broke into our house last weekend and did a lot of furniture damage. We have tried to fix everything as before resulting in a lot of hammering and banging.

Unluckily, we haven’t finished our kitchen yet. I will call a professional contractor for the remaining renovation and he will do all work in morning hours to avoid any further disturbance during nights. I promise.
Sorry for all the disturbance that occurred due to noise. I hope you understand and accept my apology. Thank you.
